Headline: #151 Sheridan Temporary Northbound Reroute near Washington/Dearborn
ShortDescription: Northbound #151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted via Dearborn, Monroe, State and Washington, due to street blockage near Washington/Dearborn.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted via Dearborn, Monroe, State and Washington, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near Washington/Dearborn.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #47 47th Temporary Eastbound  Reroute near 47th/Paulina
ShortDescription: Eastbound  #47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, Damen, 51st, Ashland and  47th, due to street blockage near 47th/Paulina.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound  #47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, Damen, 51st, Ashland and  47th, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near 47th/Paulina.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #29 State Temporary Reroute near State/63rd
ShortDescription: #29 State buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to flooding near State/63rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#29 State buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions.

  • Southbound buses will operate via State, 59th, Wells, Marquette, then resume their normal route on State.
  • Northbound buses will operate via State, Marquette, Wentworth, 59th, then resume their normal route on State.

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?

Buses are rerouted due to flooding near State/63rd.

Headline: #151 Sheridan Temporary Northbound Reroute near Dearborn/Washington
ShortDescription: Northbound 151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted via Dearborn, Monroe, State, and Washington: due to, street blockage near Dearborn/Washington.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

Northbound #151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted via Dearborn, Monroe, State, Washington and over regular route , due to street blockage near Dearborn/Washington.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Trains bypassing 69th/ Dan Ryan Station
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running, but are still not stopping at 69th/Dan Ryan due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running, but are still not stopping at 69th/Dan Ryan due to police activity.

At this time, consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes and uses to buses to other rail lines. These may include:

  • #N5 South Shore Night Bus
  • #63 63rd
  • #67 67th/69th/71st
  • #79 79th

As a result of the delay, shuttle buses are available to provide connecting service in both directions between 63rd/Dan Ryan and 79th/Dan Ryan.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

We apologize for this inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.
